title: 2.031 APPORTIONMENT.
text:
The representatives in the senate and house of representatives are apportioned throughout the state in 67 senate districts and 134 house of representatives districts. Each senate district is entitled to elect one senator and each house of representatives district is entitled to elect one representative.
[Repealed, 2013 c 125 art 1 s 108]

variables.name: senate_districts
variables.description: The number of senate districts in the state.

variables.name: house_districts
variables.description: The number of house of representatives districts in the state.

variables.name: senators_elected
variables.description: The number of senators elected in the state.

variables.name: representatives_elected
variables.description: The number of representatives elected in the state.

consequences: The apportionment of representatives in the senate and house of representatives is correct.
